name: Femboy Burgers
description:
A management/ visual novel femboy game.

Use the drag and drop system during work to assemble the ingredients to make the burger that customers want, but be careful it's timed!
.

Expenses have to be managed each day to ensure you fufill your needs, as well as save enough money to pay rent every two weeks!


Talk and give gifts to your co-workers to build up your relationship with them.


Start a new job as a femboy serving burgers -among other things!
